name: ZEROWIDTH
description:
[PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY WARNING: The whole screen may occasionally flash]

[VOLUME WARNING]

ZEROWIDTH

In ZEROWIDTH you take control of a powerful experimental spacecraft and hunt down the remaining Xeran rebels.

CONTROLS

Use the MOUSE to control your ship.

Press LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to fire.

Press SPACE BAR to mirror your ship, allowing you to shoot the opposite direction.

CREDITS

Font
